entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pangnirtung
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:20 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:20 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:20 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
